description: Acanthus 'Summer Beauty' is an amazing perennial flower commonly known as bear’s breeches. This unique and eye-catching plant can be a great addition to any flower garden. It produces long, spiny, dark green foliage with spikes of white and pink flowers. This effective combination provides a beautiful backdrop for any garden. The foliage of this plant is evergreen in most climates and makes it great for drought resistance. Once established, bear’s breeches are low-maintenance and will thrive for years to come. It is also great for attracting pollinators to your garden and will put on a show of beautiful flowers from spring until fall.
